document_data.name: Negative Energy Ray
document_data.mainbody: '''''Negative energy ray''''' was a [[spell]] that dealt negative energy damage.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell caused a beam of pure negative energy to shot out from the caster's fingers. Any creature with this beam were weakened. [[Undead]] creatures struck with the beam were healed. The strength of the beam was determined by the caster's skill level.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a mirror. The caster broke the mirror during casting.
